text: Ilova River may refer to: * Ilova River (Bosnia), in central Bosnia, tributary of Vijaka River, which is a left tributary of Ukrina River (near Prnjavor) * Ilova River (Croatia), in central Croatia, tributary of Lonja * Ilova, a tributary of the Berzasca in Romania * Ilova, a tributary of the Timiș in Romania == See also == * Ilova (disambiguation)
title: Ilova River
